mapper.sql: videoid, orgid, branchid, name, uuid, type, filepath, filename, size, md5, previewflag, status, progress, description, thumbnail, relateid, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select videoid, orgid, branchid, name, uuid, type, filepath, filename, size, md5, previewflag, status, progress, description, thumbnail, 0 as relateid, createtime, createstaffid from video where videoid = #{videoid} and status != '9'
mapper.delete: update video set status='9' where videoid = '${videoid}'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into video (orgid, branchid, name, uuid, type, filepath, filename, size, md5, previewflag, status, progress, description, thumbnail, relateid, createtime, createstaffid ) values (#{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previewflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update video
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previewflag = #{previewflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},

thumbnail = #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relateid = #{relateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where videoid = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video set orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, previewflag = #{previewflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relateid = #{relateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where videoid = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
